title: 12/08/2020 - HOUR 1 - Steelers, LeBron, Bills, Cowboys
itunes:title: 12/08/2020 - HOUR 1 - Steelers, LeBron, Bills, Cowboys
description:
The Steelers are not a dynamic team

LeBron James shouldn't care what Kyrie Irving thinks

What the Bills win over the 49ers showed us last night

The Cowboys are completely irrelevant


Guest: Logan Ryan
